title: Movies opening this week: Oct. 25
text:
Ann Dowd, Sandra Bullock and Reynaldo Pacheco star in the comedy. 
Our Brand is Crisis 
* Who's who: Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton, Anthony Mackie. 
* What's what: Bullock and Thornton star in director David Gordon Green's feature film inspired by the 2005 documentary exploring American political campaign strategists. 
Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse 
* Who's who: Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller, Joey Morgan. 
* What's what: Three Boy Scouts try to survive the zombie apocalypse. Because Hollywood is running out of ideas to exploit the walking dead genre. 
The Wonders 
* Who's who: Alba Rohrwacher, Maria Alexandra Lungu, Sam Louwyck. 
* What's what: A family of beekeepers living in the Tuscan countryside finds their household disrupted by the simultaneous arrival of a silently troubled teenage boy and a reality TV show intent on showcasing the family. 
Carter High 
* Who's who: Vivica A. Fox, Charles S. Dutton, Pooch Hall. 
* What's what: During the 1980s, Carter High School in Dallas was a football powerhouse. This is the story of four of the student athletes whose off-the-field activities cost them their future. 
— From news service reports © 2015 North Jersey Media Group Tags:
